00156 #include "LRU_List.h"

00159 /* ------ This group contains all the functions used to manipulate the LRU from outside this module ----- */
00160 
00180 LRU_list_t * LRU_Init( LRU_parameter_t lru_param, LRU_status_t *pstatus ) 
00181 {
00182   LRU_list_t * plru = NULL ;
00183 
00184 
00185   /* Sanity check */
00186   if( ( plru = (LRU_list_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( LRU_list_t  ) ) ) == NULL )
00187     {
00188       *pstatus = LRU_LIST_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00189       return NULL ;
00190     }
00191   
00192   plru->nb_entry = 0 ;
00193   plru->nb_invalid = 0 ;
00194   plru->nb_call_gc = 0 ;
00195   plru->MRU = plru->LRU = NULL ;
00196   plru->parameter = lru_param ;
00197 
00198 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00199   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00200   BuddySetDebugLabel( "LRU_entry_t" ) ;
00201 #endif
00202 
00203 #ifndef _NO_BLOCK_PREALLOC
00204   /* Pre allocate entries */
00205   STUFF_PREALLOC( plru->entry_prealloc, lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc, LRU_entry_t, next ) ;
00206   if( plru->entry_prealloc == NULL )
00207     {
00208       *pstatus = LRU_LIST_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00209       return NULL ;
00210     }
00211 #endif
00212 
00213 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00214   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00215   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00216 #endif
00217   
00218   *pstatus = LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00219   return plru ;
00220 } /* LRU_Init */
00221 
00236 int LRU_invalidate( LRU_list_t * plru, LRU_entry_t * pentry )
00237 {
00238   if( pentry->valid_state != LRU_ENTRY_INVALID )
00239     {
00240       pentry->valid_state =  LRU_ENTRY_INVALID ;
00241       plru->nb_invalid += 1 ;
00242     }
00243   
00244   return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00245 } /* LRU_invalidate */
00246 
00260 LRU_entry_t * LRU_new_entry( LRU_list_t * plru, LRU_status_t * pstatus )
00261 {
00262   LRU_entry_t * new_entry = NULL ;
00263   
00264 #ifdef _DEBUG_LRU
00265   printf( "==> LRU_new_entry: nb_entry = %d nb_entry_prealloc = %d\n", plru->nb_entry,plru->parameter. nb_entry_prealloc ) ;
00266 #endif
00267 
00268 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00269   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00270   BuddySetDebugLabel( "LRU_entry_t" ) ;
00271 #endif
00272 
00273   GET_PREALLOC( new_entry, plru->entry_prealloc, plru->parameter.nb_entry_prealloc, LRU_entry_t, next ) ;
00274   if( new_entry == NULL )
00275     {
00276       *pstatus = LRU_LIST_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00277       return NULL ;
00278     }
00279 
00280 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00281   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00282   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00283 #endif
00284   
00285   new_entry->valid_state = LRU_ENTRY_VALID ;
00286   new_entry->next = NULL ; /* Entry is added as the MRU entry */
00287    
00288   if( plru->MRU == NULL )
00289     {
00290       new_entry->prev = NULL ;
00291       plru->LRU = new_entry ;
00292     }
00293   else
00294     {
00295       new_entry->prev = plru->MRU ;
00296       plru->MRU->next = new_entry ;
00297     }
00298   
00299   plru->nb_entry += 1 ;
00300   plru->nb_call_gc += 1 ;
00301   plru->MRU = new_entry ;
00302   
00303   *pstatus = LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00304   return new_entry ;
00305 } /* LRU_new_entry */
00306 
00318 int LRU_gc_invalid( LRU_list_t * plru, void * cleanparam )
00319 {
00320   LRU_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00321   LRU_entry_t * pentrynext = NULL ;
00322   int           rc = 0 ;
00323   
00324   if( plru == NULL )
00325     return LRU_LIST_EMPTY_LIST ;
00326   
00327   if( plru->nb_invalid == 0 ) 
00328     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ; /* Nothing to be done in this case */
00329 
00330   if( plru->MRU == NULL ) 
00331     return LRU_LIST_EMPTY_LIST ;
00332 
00333   if( plru->MRU->prev == NULL ) /* One entry only, returns success (the MRU cannot be invalid) */
00334     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ; 
00335   
00336   /* Do nothing if not enough calls were done */
00337   if( plru->nb_call_gc < plru->parameter.nb_call_gc_invalid )
00338     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ; 
00339 
00340   /* From the LRU to the entry BEFORE the MRU */
00341   rc = LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ; 
00342     
00343   for( pentry = plru->LRU ; pentry != plru->MRU ; pentry = pentrynext )
00344     {
00345       pentrynext = pentry->next ;
00346 
00347       if( pentry->valid_state == LRU_ENTRY_INVALID )
00348         {
00349           if( plru->parameter.clean_entry( pentry, cleanparam ) != 0 )
00350           {
00351 #ifdef _DEBUG_LRU
00352             printf("Error cleaning pentry %p\n", pentry);
00353 #endif
00354             rc = LRU_LIST_BAD_RELEASE_ENTRY ;
00355           }
00356           
00357           if( pentry->prev != NULL )
00358             pentry->prev->next = pentry->next ;
00359           else
00360             plru->LRU = pentry->next ;
00361 
00362           if( pentry->next != NULL )
00363             pentry->next->prev = pentry->prev ;
00364 #ifdef _DEBUG_LRU
00365           else
00366             printf("SHOULD Never appear  !!!! line %d file %s\n", __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00367 #endif
00368            plru->nb_entry -= 1 ;
00369            plru->nb_invalid -= 1 ;
00370 
00371            /* Put it back to pre-allocated pool */
00372            RELEASE_PREALLOC( pentry, plru->entry_prealloc, next ) ;
00373         }
00374     }
00375       
00376   return rc ;
00377 } /* LRU_gc_invalid */
00378 
00395 int LRU_invalidate_by_function( LRU_list_t * plru, int (*testfunc)(LRU_entry_t *, void * addparam), void * addparam  ) 
00396 {
00397   LRU_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00398   LRU_entry_t * pentry_next = NULL;
00399   int           rc     = 0 ;
00400 
00401    if( plru == NULL )
00402     return LRU_LIST_EMPTY_LIST ;
00403   
00404   if( plru->nb_entry == 0 ) 
00405     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ; /* Nothing to be done in this case */
00406 
00407    if( plru->MRU == NULL ) 
00408     return LRU_LIST_EMPTY_LIST ;
00409 
00410   if( plru->MRU->prev == NULL ) /* One entry only, returns success (the MRU cannot be set invalid) */
00411     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00412 
00413   /* From the LRU to the entry BEFORE the MRU */
00414   rc = LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00415   
00416   for( pentry = plru->LRU ; pentry != plru->MRU ; pentry = pentry_next )
00417     {
00418       pentry_next = pentry->next ;
00419       if( pentry->valid_state != LRU_ENTRY_INVALID )
00420         {
00421           /* Use test function on the entry to know if it should be set invalid or not */
00422           if( testfunc( pentry, addparam ) == LRU_LIST_SET_INVALID )
00423             {
00424               if( ( rc = LRU_invalidate( plru, pentry ) ) != LRU_LIST_SUCCESS )
00425                 break ; /* end of loop, error will be returned */
00426             }
00427         } 
00428     }
00429     
00430   return rc ;
00431 } /* LRU_invalidate_by_function */
00432 
00433 
00451 int LRU_apply_function( LRU_list_t * plru, int (*myfunc)(LRU_entry_t *, void * addparam), void * addparam )
00452 {
00453   LRU_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00454   int           rc     = 0 ;
00455 
00456    if( plru == NULL )
00457     return LRU_LIST_EMPTY_LIST ;
00458 
00459   if( plru->nb_entry == 0 )
00460     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ; /* Nothing to be done in this case */
00461 
00462    if( plru->MRU == NULL )
00463     return LRU_LIST_EMPTY_LIST ;
00464 
00465   if( plru->MRU->prev == NULL ) /* One entry only, returns success (the MRU cannot be set invalid) */
00466     return LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00467 
00468   /* From the LRU to the entry BEFORE the MRU */
00469   rc = LRU_LIST_SUCCESS ;
00470   for( pentry = plru->MRU->prev ; pentry != NULL ; pentry = pentry->prev )
00471     {
00472       if( pentry->valid_state != LRU_ENTRY_INVALID )
00473         {
00474           /* Use test function on the entry to know if it should be set invalid or not */
00475           if( myfunc( pentry, addparam ) == FALSE ) 
00476             {
00477                 break ; /* end of loop */
00478             }
00479         }
00480     } /* for */
00481 
00482   return rc ;
00483 
00484 } /* LRU_apply_function */
00485 
00497 void LRU_Print( LRU_list_t * plru )
00498 {
00499   LRU_entry_t * pentry = NULL ;
00500   char dispdata[LRU_DISPLAY_STRLEN] ;
00501   
00502   for( pentry = plru->LRU ; pentry != NULL ; pentry = pentry->next )
00503     {
00504       plru->parameter.entry_to_str( pentry->buffdata, dispdata ) ;
00505       printf( "Entry value = %s, valid_state = %d\n", dispdata, pentry->valid_state ) ;
00506     }
00507   printf( "-----------------------------------------\n" ) ;
00508 } /* LRU_Print */
